Comments_List: Mathematical Analysis. Learned applications of Brownian motion, Heat kernel, etc. Developed an understanding of how mathematical analysis can be useful in the physical context.
I developed knowledge/skills into Brownian motion, eigenfunction and harmonic extension and so on.
Strengths: this course is very well organized, very well explained and well adapted to students' interests.
Yes. One could get both good theoretical understanding and a good sense of actual application.
